system_description: A real-time traffic monitoring system that collects data from roadside sensors, CCTV cameras, and GPS devices. It aggregates this data to detect congestion, suggest alternate routes, and inform emergency response units. The system should support real-time alerts, dashboard visualization, and integration with municipal databases. Performance, scalability, and responsiveness are critical due to high-volume, time-sensitive data streams.

functional_requirements.title: Real-time data collection
functional_requirements.description: The system should collect data from roadside sensors, CCTV cameras, and GPS devices in real-time.

functional_requirements.title: Data aggregation
functional_requirements.description: The system should aggregate the collected data to detect congestion, suggest alternate routes, and inform emergency response units.

functional_requirements.title: Real-time alerts
functional_requirements.description: The system should provide real-time alerts to users based on the detected congestion and other relevant information.

functional_requirements.title: Dashboard visualization
functional_requirements.description: The system should provide a dashboard visualization to users for easy understanding of the traffic situation.

functional_requirements.title: Integration with municipal databases
functional_requirements.description: The system should be able to integrate with municipal databases to access additional information and enhance its functionality.

non_functional_requirements.title: Performance
non_functional_requirements.description: The system should be able to handle high-volume, time-sensitive data streams with low latency.

non_functional_requirements.title: Scalability
non_functional_requirements.description: The system should be able to scale up or down based on the traffic volume and data processing requirements.

non_functional_requirements.title: Responsiveness
non_functional_requirements.description: The system should respond quickly to user requests and provide timely updates.
